articles.author: Gian Volpicelli
articles.title: Ukrainian troops under pressure as Russia moves to surround Bakhmut - POLITICO Europe
articles.description: UK Ministry of Defense says ‘intense fighting’ is taking place around the city in the eastern Donetsk region.
articles.content:
The Ukrainian city of Bakhmut is under increased pressure as Russian troops close in after having almost totally surrounded it, according to media reports and British intelligence. 
There is intense… [+1578 chars]
